description: This file contains Row Level Security (RLS) policies for various tables in a database schema related to a game backend. It defines access controls and policies for users, zones, missions, notifications, activity logs, and includes auxiliary functions for ownership and attackability checks.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Checks if a user owns a specific zone based on zone ID and user ID.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Determines if a zone can be attacked by a user, based on zone ownership.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Verifies if the current user context is authenticated.

calls: zones WHERE id = zone_id AND owner_id = user_id
